item.title: Journal
item.description: “Keep a diary, and someday it’ll keep you.” – Mae West

item.title: Game dev
item.description: “Every game brings me closer and closer to making what I imagine, that’s why I could never stop making games.” – Kojima Hideo

item.title: Art
item.description: “I found I could say things with color and shapes that I couldn’t say any other way - things I had no words for.” – Georgia O’Keeffe

item.title: A Good Exercise
item.description: #003 Ahhh! Nothing beats a good exercise routine to boost the energy. Also, I’ll eventually post some other content here, otherwise this website will be just a lame diary. That wouldn’t be very interesting, honestly. I’ve just been very lazy recently, but don’t worry!

item.title: Art Block
item.description: #002 I DON’T KNOW WHY, but I have no trouble drawing traditionally. When it comes to digital art, however, I just… can’t. I think I’ll transition from traditional daily sketches to digital daily sketches until I eventually get used to it. I reckon it’s all about practice

item.title: Starting Streaks!
item.description: #001 From now on, I’ll try to keep up with my schedule and routine with the streak mindset! Getting to certain milestones will help make it more memorable. I’ll also define certain awards for myself hah.

item.title: Portfolio
item.description:
HELLO WORLD!
I’m André Koga, a 18yr old Brazilian startup founder, game developer, web designer, digital artist, sports lover, scientific Olympiads medalist, and owner of two dogs. Nice to meet you! Want to send a message? Education International Universities University of Toronto, Mississauga - Studies in Computer Science, Mathematics, and Statistics University of Toronto, Scarborough - Co-op Computer Science University of Toronto, Innis College - Studies in Computer Science at the Faculty of Arts and Science University of British Columbia - Bachelor of Applied Science Program Purdue University - Computer Science in the College of Science at West Lafayette Georgia Institute of Technology - Major at Computer Science High School Colégio Farias Brito, Fortaleza, Ceará - Was recruited by the school due to excellent performance on Scientific Olympiads and awarded with a full-ride; participated in an honors class due to the olympiads.

item.title: About
item.description: Nothing to see here… Yet! Blame Koga.
